comment.author: 38523785@N00
comment._content: I'm assuming the photographer is the same Roger Fenton who served as the photographer during the Crimean War, and took the famous photograph near the location of the Charge of the Light Brigade.

comment.author: 89093669@N00
comment._content: One of my favorite spots on the planet.  My wife and I were married in Melrose and said our final vows here.
